title: Microsoft says OpenAI is now a competitor in AI and search
text: Microsoft's annually updated list of competitors now includes OpenAI, a long-term strategic partner. The change comes days after OpenAI announced a prototype of a search engine.

title: New Zealand Microsoft 365 users struggle to access service
text: New Zealand users of Microsoft services including Exchange online are having difficulty accessing them, Microsoft confirmed on Thursday.

title: Why Microsoft Stock Wilted on Wednesday
text: The tech behemoth unveiled its fiscal fourth-quarter results after market hours Tuesday. While it beat narrowly on both the top and bottom lines, many market players were expecting better.

title: Bullish Microsoft Analysts Say AI Spending Worries Are Overblown
text: Despite Microsoft's (MSFT) earnings beat, worries about weaker-than-expected cloud growth and spending on artificial intelligence (AI) sent shares lower in the wake of the company's quarterly update.

title: Microsoft By The Numbers: Past Performance And Future Valuation
text: Despite a recent dip in the stock price, Microsoft Corporation continues to be a BUY based on a strong history of delivering alpha, paired with an updated 5-year target price. The Nasdaq is currently in an 8.2% correction, with the chip sector down 19.4% and Nvidia down 26.3%. Microsoft beat earnings estimates but had soft cloud business guidance, resulting in a stock price dip.

title: Commvault Cloud with Microsoft 365 Backup Storage Delivers Choice, Enhanced Cyber Resilience and Recovery for Customers
text: Commvault Cloud with Premium Microsoft 365 Backup Storage delivers cyber resilience and recovery across Microsoft 365 workloads Native integration provides unified control with single-pane-of-glass monitoring and administration via Commvault Cloud Simplified, fully integrated solution available through Microsoft Azure Marketplace TINTON FALLS, N.J. , July 31, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Commvault, a leading provider of cyber resilience and data protection solutions for hybrid cloud organizations, today announced Microsoft 365 Backup Storage as an integrated component of Commvault® Cloud Backup and Recovery for Microsoft 365.

title: Delta CEO Says Outage Cost $500M, Leaving Airline 'No Choice' But to Seek Damages
text: The Microsoft (MSFT) outage that stemmed from an update to CrowdStrike's (CRWD) security software and ground thousands of flights cost Delta Air Lines (DAL) at least $500 million over the course of five days, CEO Ed Bastian told CNBC Wednesday.

title: Microsoft Defends Capex Spending Binge As AI Chipmakers Benefit
text: Microsoft's heavy spending on data centers to support AI is great news for chipmakers and computer vendors.

title: Nvidia shares soar 11% after Microsoft quells fears that AI buildout is too fast
text: Nvidia shares rose over 11% during trading on Wednesday after remarks from top customer Microsoft and from rival chipmaker AMD signaled no slowdown in the multi-billion dollar buildout of AI servers based around GPUs. In this article AMD

title: Microsoft To Rally Around 24%? Here Are 10 Top Analyst Forecasts For Wednesday
text: Top Wall Street analysts changed their outlook on these top names. For a complete view of all analyst rating changes, including upgrades and downgrades, please see our analyst ratings page.

title: Microsoft Stock Slide From Azure Weakness Brushed Off By Analysts: 'Azure Has Solid Pipeline, AI Has Long Runaway Ahead'
text: The performance of Microsoft Corporation's MSFT Azure cloud segment and future artificial intelligence initiatives are keys to the stock for analysts after fourth-quarter financial results.

title: Amazon's AWS Growth Expected To Outpace Microsoft Azure, Analyst Optimistic
text: JMP Securities analyst Nicholas Jones rated Amazon.com Inc AMZN shares with Market Perform and a price target of $225.

title: Microsoft reveals cyberattack triggered latest outage that stalled emails, crashed Starbucks app
text: The Azure platform's defense response may have “amplified the impact” rather than initially mitigating it.

title: Microsoft ETFs Tumble as Q3 Cloud Growth Slows Down
text: Though Microsoft (MSFT) beat earnings and revenue estimates, growth in Azure cloud computing slowed down. Microsoft also offered weak guidance for the ongoing quarter.

title: Microsoft Q4: Buy The Correction
text: Microsoft Corporation fiscal Q4 results, quite solid in my view, met with a market correction. New catalysts afoot point to both continued growth and the potential for margin expansion, with the latter underestimated by consensus. The stock price correction has also brought the valuation to a quite attractive level for long-term investors.

title: Microsoft (MSFT) Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat on Cloud Success
text: Microsoft's (MSFT) fourth-quarter fiscal 2024 shines with robust Azure and Office 365 performance, amplified by surging AI Copilot adoption.

title: 2 Vanguard stocks to turn $100 into $1,000 by 2025
text: Less than a year away from its 50th birthday and with more than $9 trillion in assets under management, Vanguard is one of the most recognizable investment firms in the world.

title: How Microsoft Earnings Sank the Stock but Saved the Market
text: AI-related stocks like Nvidia, AMD, Intel, and Broadcom were climbing Wednesday.

title: Microsoft cloud unit miss dulls bright earnings
text: Microsoft on Tuesday reported strong quarterly earnings but saw its shares slip on figures showing its crucial cloud computing unit did not grow as strongly as expected.

title: Conviction Firms for Microsoft's Double-Digit Stock Upside
text: Microsoft NASDAQ: MSFT shares are falling, and this is a buy-the-dip opportunity. The Q4 results failed to spark a rebound in share prices but give no reason to shed a position and every reason to believe a double-digit upside will come soon.

title: Anaconda Debuts New Solution to Run Python Locally in Microsoft Excel
text: Data science and AI platform provider's Anaconda Toolbox helps users conduct Python-powered projects in Excel locally with its Anaconda Code add-in Data science and AI platform provider's Anaconda Toolbox helps users conduct Python-powered projects in Excel locally with its Anaconda Code add-in

title: MSFT STOCKHOLDER ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz and Grossman, LLC Announces an Investigation into Microsoft Corporation and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm Today!
text: NEW YORK, NY, NY / ACCESSWIRE / July 31, 2024 / Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC is investigating potential claims on behalf of purchasers of Microsoft Corporation ("Microsoft" or "the Company") (NASDAQ:MSFT). Investors who purchased Microsoft securities are encouraged to obtain additional information and assist the investigation by visiting the firm's site: bgandg.com/MSFT.

title: Microsoft Earnings Sell-Off: A Buying Opportunity?
text: Microsoft stock fell as much as 7% after reporting earnings.

title: MSFT Stock Falls as Microsoft Cloud Revenue Disappoints. What's Going On?
text: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT ) stock is falling 2% in early trading, and the shares are trending on social media and business news websites this morning. The company reported its fiscal fourth-quarter results yesterday after the market closed, and investors focused on the revenue of its cloud unit, which came in slightly below analysts' average outlook.

title: Microsoft Stock Drops As AI Capital Expenditures Surge To $56 Billion
text: Microsoft stock is falling short of the market averages. Through July 30, Microsoft stock had risen 14% — slightly below the S&P 500's 14.6% increase, according to Google Finance.

title: Microsoft Q4 Earnings: AI Capital Expenditures Remain Strong And Growing
text: Despite a recent dip in Microsoft Corporation's stock due to a slowdown in Azure revenue, the company's growth trajectory remains strong, driven by substantial investments in AI. The management is confident that Azure's growth will reaccelerate in 2H FY2025 as previous capex leads to increased AI capacity to meet the growing demand. Its capex as a percentage of revenue expanded to 21.4%, up from 17.7%, reaching a record high, while its FCF grew 24.5% YoY in FY2024, the highest in 6 years.

title: Microsoft Misses And Boeing Names New CEO
text: Tech Stocks Drop, Small Caps Gain Amid Market Volatility

title: Microsoft's timeline for its massive AI bet is testing everyone's patience
text: Investors want to know when Big Tech's huge investments in AI will generate returns. Microsoft gave them an answer on Tuesday as it reported earnings.

title: Delta CEO says CrowdStrike-Microsoft outage cost the airline $500 million
text: Delta CEO says CrowdStrike-Microsoft outage cost the airline $500 million

title: Forget Nvidia: 2 Tech Stocks to Buy Instead
text: Nvidia relies heavily on TSMC for its GPU manufacturing. TSMC expects AI chips to be around 20% of its total revenue within the next five years.

title: Myopic market pummels Microsoft for $81bn
text: Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) is expected to shed up to $81 billion in market value when US trading commences on Wednesday. The 2.6% pre-market fall in the Redmond megacap's share price is due to revenue concerns in its Azure cloud-computing segment.

title: Carpetright failure leaves Royal Mail, Microsoft owed millions
text: Royal Mail and Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) are among those collectively owed £213 million following Carpetright's collapse, reports have said. The postal service and technology giant could receive less than 1p in the pound on their debts based on administrators' proposals, according to The Times.

title: Microsoft stock price prediction as ‘death candle' hits
text: After a massive global IT outage, which brought multiple industries to a standstill on July 19, troubles have continued for Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) stocks, the price of which has steadily declined since and has recently even demonstrated a ‘death candle' on its chart, signalling more difficulties.

title: Nvidia Stock Gains. What Microsoft and AMD's Reports Mean for the Chip Maker.
text: Nvidia investors looked to be heartened by signs of continued spending on hardware to power artificial-intelligence technology.
